mapper.select: select a.qnanum, a.title, a.content, a.regdate, b.typename, c.nickname from tbl_qna a join tbl_qnatype b on a.typenum = b.typenum join tbl_member c on a.membernum = c.membernum where a.qnanum = #{qnanum} order by a.qnanum desc
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_qna (qnanum, title, content, typenum, membernum) values (QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{typenum}, #{membernum})
